data.message: Em has always been able to take what's culturally hot and get publicity on the spot. He's managed to offend masses. That's Shady's roll. Shady is there to instigate or create problems. He's not turning rocks on thier bottoms, lookin' to solve them.

replies.message: way more bold would have been to support trump.
